#summary client used to issue commands to the prebakery

= The `bake` client <font size="1">[http://code.google.com/p/prebake/source/browse/trunk/code/src/org/prebake/client/Bake.java (src)]</font> =

== Usage ==

{{{
bake [-v | -vv | -q | -qq | --logLevel=<level>] <command> <arg0>...

    -qq         extra quiet : errors only
    -q          quiet : warnings and errors only
    -v          verbose
    -vv         extra verbose
    --logLevel  see java.util.logging.Level for value names
}}}

Where the arguments are specific to the [PreBakeCommand command] used.

|| *command line* || *effect* ||
|| `bake bake cake` || to build the target named cake ||
|| `bake shutdown` || shuts the service down ||
